Interface HealthService

    public HealthService

    Created by Shynixn 2019.

    • Method Detail

      • damagePet

        void damagePet(PetMeta petMeta,
               double damage)

        Damages the given petMeta with the given damage. The pet needs a health ai otherwise this operation gets ignored.

        See Also:
        petMeta, damage
